Prayog (प्रयोग) means experimentation in Sanskrit. We're a technology studio built on the principle that great products emerge through thoughtful experimentation.

Explore Our Philosophy

Philosophy

At our core, we believe in the power of experimentation. We build software through continuous testing, learning, and refining to create solutions that truly work.

Iteration

Rapid prototyping and agile development drive our process. We ship fast, gather data, and optimize relentlessly.

Simplicity

Clean code, minimal interfaces, maximum impact. We build elegant solutions that just work.

Innovation

We merge cutting-edge tech with proven frameworks to build tomorrow's solutions today.

Creations

Our experiments lead to real-world solutions that help people and businesses. Each product is the result of our iterative development process.
